card.name: Angel of Salvation
card.property: Flash; convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.) Flying When Angel of Salvation enters the battlefield, prevent the next 5 damage that would be dealt this turn to any number of targets, divided as you choose.

card.name: Augur il-Vec
card.property: Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.) Sacrifice Augur il-Vec: You gain 4 life. Activate this ability only during your upkeep.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If it would end this exile, my life is yours."

card.name: Barren Glory
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control no permanents other than Barren Glory and have no cards in hand, you win the game.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The only perfect world is an empty world, with no one to sin or wage war." —Tarran, magus of the disk

card.name: Chronomantic Escape
card.property: Until your next turn, creatures can't attack you. Exile Chronomantic Escape with three time counters on it. Suspend 3—{2}{W} (Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {2}{W} and exile it with three time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost.)

card.name: Dust of Moments
card.property: Choose one — • Remove two time counters from each permanent and each suspended card. • Put two time counters on each permanent with a time counter on it and each suspended card.

card.name: Even the Odds
card.property: Cast this spell only if you control fewer creatures than each opponent. Create three 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "They who fall singing the battle hymn of Benalia go not unavenged." —Adom Capashen, Benalish commander

card.name: Gift of Granite
card.property: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.) Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +0/+2.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The blessing adds both protection to the recipient and weightlessness to the stone.

card.name: Intervention Pact
card.property: The next time a source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage. You gain life equal to the damage prevented this way. At the beginning of your next upkeep, pay {1}{W}{W}. If you don't, you lose the game.

card.name: Judge Unworthy
card.property: Choose target attacking or blocking creature. Scry 3, then reveal the top card of your library. Judge Unworthy deals damage equal to that card's converted mana cost to that creature. (To scry 3, look at the top three cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

card.name: Knight of Sursi
card.property: Flying; flanking (Whenever a creature without flanking blocks this creature, the blocking creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.) Suspend 3—{W} (Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {W} and exile it with three time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost. It has haste.)

card.name: Lost Auramancers
card.property: Vanishing 3 (This creature enters the battlefield with three time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter from it. When the last is removed, sacrifice it.) When Lost Auramancers dies, if it had no time counters on it, you may search your library for an enchantment card and put it onto the battlefield. If you do, shuffle your library.

card.name: Magus of the Moat
card.property: Creatures without flying can't attack.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The spirits of the mythic ones ever circle their beloved keep, forbidding entry to all who come with the heavy tread of hate."

card.name: Marshaling Cry
card.property: Creatures you control get +1/+1 and gain vigilance until end of turn. Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.) Flashback {3}{W} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

card.name: Saltskitter
card.property: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield, exile Saltskitter. Return Saltskitter to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Samite Censer-Bearer
card.property: {W}, Sacrifice Samite Censer-Bearer: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to each creature you control this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Samite alchemists extracted aromatic traces of healing minerals from the residue of the receding salt dunes.

card.name: Scout's Warning
card.property: The next creature card you play this turn can be played as though it had flash. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There is no tactic I enjoy more than ambushing the ambushers."

card.name: Spirit en-Dal
card.property: Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.) Forecast — {1}{W}, Reveal Spirit en-Dal from your hand: Target creature gains shadow until end of turn. (Activate this ability only during your upkeep and only once each turn.)

card.name: Aven Mindcensor
card.property: Flash Flying If an opponent would search a library, that player searches the top four cards of that library instead.

card.name: Bound in Silence
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't attack or block.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A fight put off forever is already won.

card.name: Daybreak Coronet
card.property: Enchant creature with another Aura attached to it Enchanted creature gets +3/+3 and has first strike, vigilance, and lifelink. (Damage dealt by the creature also causes its controller to gain that much life.)

card.name: Goldmeadow Lookout
card.property: {W}, {T}, Discard a card: Create a 1/1 white Kithkin Soldier creature token named Goldmeadow Harrier. It has "{W}, {T}: Tap target creature."

card.name: Imperial Mask
card.property: When Imperial Mask enters the battlefield, if it's not a token, each of your teammates creates a token that's a copy of Imperial Mask. You have hexproof. (You can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)

card.name: Lucent Liminid
card.property: Flying

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It is a herald of the sun goddess, projected from the hallowed glass whenever her light passes through.

card.name: Lumithread Field
card.property: Creatures you control get +0/+1. Morph {1}{W} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Having conquered the Bastion of Suns, the Ota took its light for their own.

card.name: Lymph Sliver
card.property: All Sliver creatures have absorb 1. (If a source would deal damage to a Sliver, prevent 1 of that damage.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its skin remains in a flowing, liquid state that keeps its body coated with potent restorative lymph.

card.name: Mistmeadow Skulk
card.property: Lifelink, protection from converted mana cost 3 or greater

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Doyo suspected the boggarts of brewing a plot against his crop, so he scythed away his grain to clear the sightlines.

card.name: Oriss, Samite Guardian
card.property: {T}: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn. Grandeur — Discard another card named Oriss, Samite Guardian: Target player can't cast spells this turn, and creatures that player controls can't attack this turn.

card.name: Patrician's Scorn
card.property: If you've cast another white spell this turn, you may cast this spell without paying its mana cost. Destroy all enchantments.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Lady Farisa's contempt of tawdry kitsch grew even more infamous after her death.

card.name: Ramosian Revivalist
card.property: {6}, {T}: Return target Rebel permanent card with converted mana cost 5 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Ramosian tradition is alive, but its namesake has long since been forgotten.

card.name: Seht's Tiger
card.property: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.) When Seht's Tiger enters the battlefield, you gain protection from the color of your choice until end of turn. (You can't be targeted, dealt damage, or enchanted by anything of the chosen color.)

card.name: Aven Augur
card.property: Flying Sacrifice Aven Augur: Return up to two target creatures to their owners' hands. Activate this ability only during your upkeep.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I have seen the future. It does not include you."

card.name: Cloudseeder
card.property: Flying {U}, {T}, Discard a card: Create a 1/1 blue Faerie creature token named Cloud Sprite. It has flying and "Cloud Sprite can block only creatures with flying."

card.name: Cryptic Annelid
card.property: When Cryptic Annelid enters the battlefield, scry 1, then scry 2, then scry 3. (To scry X, look at the top X cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

card.name: Delay
card.property: Counter target spell. If the spell is countered this way, exile it with three time counters on it instead of putting it into its owner's graveyard. If it doesn't have suspend, it gains suspend. (At the beginning of its owner's upkeep, remove a time counter from that card. When the last is removed, the player plays it without paying its mana cost. If it's a creature, it has haste.)

card.name: Foresee
card.property: Scry 4, then draw two cards. (To scry 4, look at the top four cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Wind time's watch, and watch time unwind.

card.name: Infiltrator il-Kor
card.property: Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.) Suspend 2—{1}{U} (Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {1}{U} and exile it with two time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost. It has haste.)

card.name: Leaden Fists
card.property: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.) Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +3/+3 and doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.

card.name: Maelstrom Djinn
card.property: Flying Morph {2}{U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.) When Maelstrom Djinn is turned face up, put two time counters on it and it gains vanishing. (At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter from it. When the last is removed, sacrifice it.)

card.name: Magus of the Future
card.property: Play with the top card of your library revealed. You may play lands and cast spells from the top of your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Those gifted with the sight have one eye in the present and the other in the future.

card.name: Mystic Speculation
card.property: Buyback {2} (You may pay an additional {2} as you cast this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.) Scry 3. (Look at the top three cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

card.name: Pact of Negation
card.property: Counter target spell. At the beginning of your next upkeep, pay {3}{U}{U}. If you don't, you lose the game.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Those who expect betrayal at every turn are seldom disappointed.

card.name: Reality Strobe
card.property: Return target permanent to its owner's hand. Exile Reality Strobe with three time counters on it. Suspend 3—{2}{U} (Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {2}{U} and exile it with three time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost.)

card.name: Take Possession
card.property: Split second (As long as this spell is on the stack, players can't cast spells or activate abilities that aren't mana abilities.) Enchant permanent You control enchanted permanent.

card.name: Unblinking Bleb
card.property: Morph {2}{U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.) Whenever Unblinking Bleb or another permanent is turned face up, you may scry 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

card.name: Venser, Shaper Savant
card.property: Flash When Venser, Shaper Savant enters the battlefield, return target spell or permanent to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: His marvels of artifice pale in comparison to the developing machinery of his mind.

card.name: Venser's Diffusion
card.property: Return target nonland permanent or suspended card to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Each reality is but the dream of another, and each sleeper a god unknowing."

card.name: Arcanum Wings
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has flying. Aura swap {2}{U} ({2}{U}: Exchange this Aura with an Aura card in your hand.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Nobles don wings to reach the sky villas of their peers, exchanging them for more fashionable attire upon arrival.

card.name: Bonded Fetch
card.property: Defender, haste {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A well-made homunculus grooms the mind of its master, pruning the thoughts that lead to madness. Few loredelvers survive the study of the infinite without one.

card.name: Linessa, Zephyr Mage
Logic Knot
card.property: Delve (Each card you exile from your graveyard while casting this spell pays for {1}.) Counter target spell unless its controller pays {X}.

card.name: Mesmeric Sliver
card.property: All Slivers have "When this permanent enters the battlefield, you may fateseal 1." (To fateseal 1, its controller looks at the top card of an opponent's library, then they may put that card on the bottom of that library.)

card.name: Narcomoeba
card.property: Flying When Narcomoeba is put into your graveyard from your library, you may put it onto the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It was created by the Iquati as a living memory—one that objects to being forgotten.

card.name: Nix
card.property: Counter target spell if no mana was spent to cast it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There is no shortcut to work done true and well. The Creators learned this to their sorrow, the first time they made the world." —Githri the Prisoner

card.name: Sarcomite Myr
card.property: {2}: Sarcomite Myr gains flying until end of turn. {2}, Sacrifice Sarcomite Myr: Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A horrible sight, yes, but the sounds . . . Its twanging tendons and grinding gears are almost musical." —Brudiclad, Telchor engineer

card.name: Second Wind
card.property: Enchant creature {T}: Tap enchanted creature. {T}: Untap enchanted creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Vindr stormchasers believe that the same ancient forces that move the winds can also move mortal minds and hearts.

card.name: Shapeshifter's Marrow
card.property: At the beginning of each opponent's upkeep, that player reveals the top card of their library. If it's a creature card, the player puts the card into their graveyard and Shapeshifter's Marrow becomes a copy of that card. (If it does, it loses this ability.)

card.name: Spellweaver Volute
card.property: Enchant instant card in a graveyard Whenever you cast a sorcery spell, copy the enchanted instant card. You may cast the copy without paying its mana cost. If you do, exile the enchanted card and attach Spellweaver Volute to another instant card in a graveyard.

card.name: Spin into Myth
card.property: Put target creature on top of its owner's library, then fateseal 2. (To fateseal 2, look at the top two cards of an opponent's library, then put any number of them on the bottom of that player's library and the rest on top in any order.)

card.name: Vedalken Aethermage
card.property: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.) When Vedalken Aethermage enters the battlefield, return target Sliver to its owner's hand. Wizardcycling {3} ({3}, Discard this card: Search your library for a Wizard card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.)

card.name: Whip-Spine Drake
card.property: Flying Morph {2}{W} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I swear the clouds were created just so the drakes would have a place to lurk." —Kasharri, skyknight

card.name: Augur of Skulls

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Within each empty skull, it seeks ways to preserve its own failing undeath.

card.name: Cutthroat il-Dal
card.property: Hellbent — Cutthroat il-Dal has shadow as long as you have no cards in hand. (It can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Her blades slashed across the noble's shadow. He scoffed, then fell over dead.

card.name: Festering March
card.property: Creatures your opponents control get -1/-1 until end of turn. Exile Festering March with three time counters on it. Suspend 3—{2}{B} (Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {2}{B} and exile it with three time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost.)

card.name: Gibbering Descent
card.property: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player loses 1 life and discards a card. Hellbent — Skip your upkeep step if you have no cards in hand. Madness {2}{B}{B} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

card.name: Grave Peril
card.property: When a nonblack creature enters the battlefield, sacrifice Grave Peril. If you do, destroy that creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Sometimes the grave does not wait for death before relishing its feast of flesh and bones." —Ezrith, druid of the Dark Hours

card.name: Ichor Slick
card.property: Target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn. Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.) Madness {3}{B} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

card.name: Lost Hours
card.property: Target player reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it. That player puts that card into their library third from the top.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Your thoughts do not interest me nearly as much as the absence thereof." —Gorghul, augur of skulls

card.name: Magus of the Abyss
card.property: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, destroy target nonartifact creature that player controls of their choice. It can't be regenerated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He climbs a staircase of falling souls, fighting the continuous pull of the void.

card.name: Minions' Murmurs
card.property: You draw X cards and you lose X life, where X is the number of creatures you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "They are quick to offer advice, those whose mistakes doomed them to undeath. How can I not listen to the wisdom of failure?" —Ratadrabik of Urborg

card.name: Nihilith
card.property: Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.) Suspend 7—{1}{B} (Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {1}{B} and exile it with seven time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost. It has haste.) Whenever a card is put into an opponent's graveyard from anywhere, if Nihilith is suspended, you may remove a time counter from Nihilith.

card.name: Oblivion Crown
card.property: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.) Enchant creature Enchanted creature has "Discard a card: This creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn."

card.name: Pooling Venom
card.property: Enchant land Whenever enchanted land becomes tapped, its controller loses 2 life. {3}{B}: Destroy enchanted land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The land can only hold so much poison before it begins to bite back.

card.name: Putrid Cyclops
card.property: When Putrid Cyclops enters the battlefield, scry 1, then reveal the top card of your library. Putrid Cyclops gets -X/-X until end of turn, where X is that card's converted mana cost. (To scry 1, look at the top card of your library, then you may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

card.name: Shimian Specter
card.property: Flying Whenever Shimian Specter deals combat damage to a player, that player reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it. Search that player's graveyard, hand, and library for all cards with the same name as that card and exile them. Then that player shuffles their library.

card.name: Skirk Ridge Exhumer
card.property: {B}, {T}, Discard a card: Create a 1/1 black Zombie Goblin creature token named Festering Goblin. It has "When Festering Goblin dies, target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn."

card.name: Slaughter Pact
card.property: Destroy target nonblack creature. At the beginning of your next upkeep, pay {2}{B}. If you don't, you lose the game.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Death is only the beginning of the end.

card.name: Stronghold Rats
card.property: Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.) Whenever Stronghold Rats deals combat damage to a player, each player discards a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In the stronghold's dungeons, the shadows hide in the vermin.

card.name: Bitter Ordeal
card.property: Search target player's library for a card and exile it. Then that player shuffles their library. Gravestorm (When you cast this spell, copy it for each permanent put into a graveyard this turn. You may choose new targets for the copies.)

card.name: Bridge from Below
card.property: Whenever a nontoken creature is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, if Bridge from Below is in your graveyard, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token. When a creature is put into an opponent's graveyard from the battlefield, if Bridge from Below is in your graveyard, exile Bridge from Below.

card.name: Death Rattle
card.property: Delve (Each card you exile from your graveyard while casting this spell pays for {1}.) Destroy target nongreen creature. It can't be regenerated.

card.name: Deepcavern Imp
card.property: Flying, haste Echo—Discard a card. (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.)

card.name: Fleshwrither
card.property: Transfigure {1}{B}{B} ({1}{B}{B}, Sacrifice this creature: Search your library for a creature card with the same converted mana cost as this creature and put that card onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library. Transfigure only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Frenzy Sliver
card.property: All Sliver creatures have frenzy 1. (Whenever a Sliver attacks and isn't blocked, it gets +1/+0 until end of turn.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Arturan conjurers took the strange, alien fossil and patterned their own twisted creations in its image.

card.name: Grave Scrabbler
card.property: Madness {1}{B} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.) When Grave Scrabbler enters the battlefield, if its madness cost was paid, you may return target creature card from a graveyard to its owner's hand.

card.name: Korlash, Heir to Blackblade
card.property: Korlash, Heir to Blackblade's power and toughness are each equal to the number of Swamps you control. {1}{B}: Regenerate Korlash. Grandeur — Discard another card named Korlash, Heir to Blackblade: Search your library for up to two Swamp cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.

card.name: Snake Cult Initiation
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has poisonous 3. (Whenever it deals combat damage to a player, that player gets three poison counters. A player with ten or more poison counters loses the game.)

card.name: Street Wraith
card.property: Swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.) Cycling—Pay 2 life. (Pay 2 life, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The lamps on Wyndmoor Street snuff themselves at midnight and refuse to relight, afraid to illuminate what lies in the darkness.

card.name: Tombstalker
card.property: Flying Delve (Each card you exile from your graveyard while casting this spell pays for {1}.)

card.name: Witch's Mist
card.property: {2} {B}, {T}: Destroy target creature that was dealt damage this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Hear us, Overmother. Let the strong thrive under your gelatinous hand, and let the weak writhe under your serrated heel." —Prayer of the devoted

card.name: Yixlid Jailer
card.property: Cards in graveyards lose all abilities.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I have an eternity to know the souls who are bound here, to behold their every facet. But moments from now they will be gagged and masked, and they shall be known by none other."

card.name: Arc Blade

card.name: Bogardan Lancer

card.name: Char-Rumbler
card.property: Double strike {R}: Char-Rumbler gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Elementals flourished as Dominaria healed and new forms of life adapted to the land's reinfusion with mana.

card.name: Emberwilde Augur

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Legends say a djinn gave the goblins a gift they could never hope to master.

card.name: Fatal Attraction

card.name: Gathan Raiders
card.property: Hellbent — Gathan Raiders gets +2/+2 as long as you have no cards in hand. Morph—Discard a card. (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

card.name: Magus of the Moon
card.property: Nonbasic lands are Mountains.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Tidal forces of the blood moon wrench and buckle the land, drawing monoliths of stone and soil toward the flaming orb.

card.name: Molten Disaster
card.property: Kicker {R} (You may pay an additional {R} as you cast this spell.) If this spell was kicked, it has split second. (As long as this spell is on the stack, players can't cast spells or activate abilities that aren't mana abilities.) Molten Disaster deals X damage to each creature without flying and each player.

card.name: Pact of the Titan
card.property: Create a 4/4 red Giant creature token. At the beginning of your next upkeep, pay {4}{R}. If you don't, you lose the game.

card.name: Pyromancer's Swath
card.property: If an instant or sorcery source you control would deal damage to a permanent or player, it deals that much damage plus 2 to that permanent or player instead. At the beginning of each end step, discard your hand.

card.name: Riddle of Lightning
card.property: Choose any target. Scry 3, then reveal the top card of your library. Riddle of Lightning deals damage equal to that card's converted mana cost to that permanent or player. (To scry 3, look at the top three cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

card.name: Rift Elemental
card.property: {1} {R}, Remove a time counter from a permanent you control or suspended card you own: Rift Elemental gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It's difficult to heal a rift after it begins wandering about on its own." —Teferi

card.name: Scourge of Kher Ridges
card.property: Flying {1}{R}: Scourge of Kher Ridges deals 2 damage to each creature without flying. {5}{R}: Scourge of Kher Ridges deals 6 damage to each other creature with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Doom casts its own flickering shadow.

card.name: Shivan Sand-Mage
card.property: When Shivan Sand-Mage enters the battlefield, choose one — • Remove two time counters from target permanent or suspended card. • Put two time counters on target permanent with a time counter on it or suspended card. Suspend 4—{R} (Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {R} and exile it with four time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost. It has haste.)

card.name: Sparkspitter
card.property: {R}, {T}, Discard a card: Create a 3/1 red Elemental creature token named Spark Elemental. It has trample, haste, and "At the beginning of the end step, sacrifice Spark Elemental."

card.name: Bloodshot Trainee
card.property: {T}: Bloodshot Trainee deals 4 damage to target creature. Activate this ability only if Bloodshot Trainee's power is 4 or greater.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Hrrngh! Someday I'm going to hurl this . . . er . . . roll this . . . hrrngh . . . nudge this boulder right down a cliff."

card.name: Boldwyr Intimidator
card.property: Cowards can't block Warriors. {R}: Target creature becomes a Coward until end of turn. {2}{R}: Target creature becomes a Warrior until end of turn.

card.name: Emblem of the Warmind
card.property: Enchant creature you control Creatures you control have haste.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It takes but one spark to ignite a parched forest. Our hearts, I fear, are too dry for this new visitor." —Elek Longbeard

card.name: Flowstone Embrace
card.property: Enchant creature {T}: Enchanted creature gets +2/-2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The seventh symbol, the Mark of Stone, stores the power of ancient Rath." —Tome of Elemental Mastery

card.name: Ghostfire
card.property: Ghostfire is colorless. Ghostfire deals 3 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Only those gifted with the eye of Ugin, the spirit dragon, can see his fiery breath.

card.name: Grinning Ignus
card.property: {R}, Return Grinning Ignus to its owner's hand: Add {C}{C}{R}. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Take care what you offer the ignus. Food, perhaps. Coins. But nothing flammable!" —Stovic, village eccentric

card.name: Henchfiend of Ukor
card.property: Haste Echo {1}{B} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.) {B/R}: Henchfiend of Ukor gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Homing Sliver
card.property: Each Sliver card in each player's hand has slivercycling {3}. Slivercycling {3} ({3}, Discard this card: Search your library for a Sliver card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.)

card.name: Shah of Naar Isle
card.property: Trample Echo {0} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.) When Shah of Naar Isle's echo cost is paid, each opponent may draw up to three cards.

card.name: Skizzik Surger
card.property: Haste Echo—Sacrifice two lands. (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.)

card.name: Steamflogger Boss
card.property: Other Riggers you control get +1/+0 and have haste. If a Rigger you control would assemble a Contraption, it assembles two Contraptions instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Whip the Xs ! Pinch the Os! What we're building, no one knows!"

card.name: Storm Entity
card.property: Haste Storm Entity enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each other spell cast this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Dweldian magi don't enter the Realm of Thrones when they die. Instead their souls are drawn to great works of magic.

card.name: Tarox Bladewing
card.property: Flying, haste Grandeur — Discard another card named Tarox Bladewing: Tarox Bladewing gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is its power.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Despising his siblings as insults to his line, he finds and devours each in turn.

card.name: Thunderblade Charge
card.property: Thunderblade Charge deals 3 damage to any target. Whenever one or more creatures you control deal combat damage to a player, if Thunderblade Charge is in your graveyard, you may pay {2}{R}{R}{R}. If you do, you may cast it without paying its mana cost.

card.name: Cyclical Evolution
card.property: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn. Exile Cyclical Evolution with three time counters on it. Suspend 3—{2}{G} (Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {2}{G} and exile it with three time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost.)

card.name: Force of Savagery
card.property: Trample

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Life cannot be created and then abandoned. It must be nurtured and fed so that it may express its ripened might."—Freyalise

card.name: Heartwood Storyteller
card.property: Whenever a player casts a noncreature spell, each of that player's opponents may draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: His roots reach deep, nurtured not by soil and rain, but by millennia of experience.

card.name: Kavu Primarch
card.property: Kicker {4} (You may pay an additional {4} as you cast this spell.) Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.) If Kavu Primarch was kicked, it enters the battlefield with four +1/+1 counters on it.

card.name: Llanowar Augur
card.property: Sacrifice Llanowar Augur: Target creature gets +3/+3 and gains trample until end of turn. Activate this ability only during your upkeep.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I am irrelevant. The future I hold in my hands is everything."

card.name: Llanowar Empath
card.property: When Llanowar Empath enters the battlefield, scry 2, then reveal the top card of your library. If it's a creature card, put it into your hand. (To scry 2, look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

card.name: Llanowar Mentor
card.property: {G}, {T}, Discard a card: Create a 1/1 green Elf Druid creature token named Llanowar Elves. It has "{T}: Add {G}."

card.name: Magus of the Vineyard
card.property: At the beginning of each player's precombat main phase, that player adds {G}{G}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Battered and beaten by years of salt and claw, he never ceased to walk, and to seed. Only now, in this time of rebirth, do his seeds take root.

card.name: Petrified Plating
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2. Suspend 2—{G} (Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {G} and exile it with two time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost.)

card.name: Quiet Disrepair
card.property: Enchant artifact or enchantment At the beginning of your upkeep, choose one — • Destroy enchanted permanent. • You gain 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Artifice has always stood upon nature's shoulders. Let us watch nature take a turn." —Freyalise

card.name: Ravaging Riftwurm
card.property: Kicker {4} (You may pay an additional {4} as you cast this spell.) Vanishing 2 (This creature enters the battlefield with two time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter from it. When the last is removed, sacrifice it.) If Ravaging Riftwurm was kicked, it enters the battlefield with three additional time counters on it.

card.name: Riftsweeper
card.property: When Riftsweeper enters the battlefield, choose target face-up exiled card. Its owner shuffles it into their library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Beings of the rifts are not natural. No longer will these abominations tread upon the body of Gaea."

card.name: Rites of Flourishing
card.property: At the beginning of each player's draw step, that player draws an additional card. Each player may play an additional land on each of their turns.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Dance, and bring forth the coil! It is an umbilical to Gaea herself, fattening us with the earth's rich bounty."

card.name: Sprout Swarm
card.property: Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.) Buyback {3} (You may pay an additional {3} as you cast this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.) Create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token.

card.name: Summoner's Pact
card.property: Search your library for a green creature card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library. At the beginning of your next upkeep, pay {2}{G}{G}. If you don't, you lose the game.

card.name: Utopia Mycon
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, put a spore counter on Utopia Mycon. Remove three spore counters from Utopia Mycon: Create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token. Sacrifice a Saproling: Add one mana of any color.

card.name: Wrap in Vigor
card.property: Regenerate each creature you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some nature mages unknowingly took advantage of the temporal energies still swirling on Dominaria. What they mistook for healing magic was in fact the manipulation of time.

card.name: Baru, Fist of Krosa
card.property: Whenever a Forest enters the battlefield, green creatures you control get +1/+1 and gain trample until end of turn. Grandeur — Discard another card named Baru, Fist of Krosa: Create an X/X green Wurm creature token, where X is the number of lands you control.

card.name: Centaur Omenreader
card.property: As long as Centaur Omenreader is tapped, creature spells you cast cost {2} less to cast.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The wisdom of the omenreaders is legendary. Creatures travel for miles through icy peril to seek their counsel.

card.name: Edge of Autumn
card.property: If you control four or fewer lands, search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library. Cycling—Sacrifice a land. (Sacrifice a land, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "At harvest are seeds of next year sown."

card.name: Imperiosaur
card.property: Spend only mana produced by basic lands to cast this spell.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "An ancient, powerful force has overtaken the valley. I sympathize for its former inhabitants, but I rejoice for the land itself." —Olanti, Muraganda druid

card.name: Muraganda Petroglyphs
card.property: Creatures with no abilities get +2/+2.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some mages forsake their scrolls and libraries to learn at the feet of ancient trees and sacred stones.

card.name: Nacatl War-Pride
card.property: Nacatl War-Pride must be blocked by exactly one creature if able. Whenever Nacatl War-Pride attacks, create X tokens that are copies of Nacatl War-Pride and that are tapped and attacking, where X is the number of creatures defending player controls. Exile the tokens at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Phosphorescent Feast
card.property: Chroma — Reveal any number of cards in your hand. You gain 2 life for each green mana symbol in those cards' mana costs.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Mushroom Queen sits among her spores, Enjoying life and avoiding chores." —Ibblian pixie ditty

card.name: Quagnoth
card.property: Split second (As long as this spell is on the stack, players can't cast spells or activate abilities that aren't mana abilities.) Shroud (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities.) When a spell or ability an opponent controls causes you to discard Quagnoth, return it to your hand.

card.name: Spellwild Ouphe
card.property: Spells that target Spellwild Ouphe cost {2} less to cast.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You'd think that their big glowing eyes would be almost hypnotic to look at. In fact, it's the other way around—they are entranced by nearly everything they see." —Balecki, Spellwild druid

card.name: Sporoloth Ancient
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, put a spore counter on Sporoloth Ancient. Creatures you control have "Remove two spore counters from this creature: Create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token."

card.name: Tarmogoyf
card.property: Tarmogoyf's power is equal to the number of card types among cards in all graveyards and its toughness is equal to that number plus 1.

card.name: Thornweald Archer
card.property: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.) Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Their arrows are tipped with basilisk eyes and fletched with cockatrice feathers.

card.name: Virulent Sliver
card.property: All Sliver creatures have poisonous 1. (Whenever a Sliver deals combat damage to a player, that player gets a poison counter. A player with ten or more poison counters loses the game.)

card.name: Glittering Wish
card.property: You may choose a multicolored card you own from outside the game, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. Exile Glittering Wish.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: She wished for gold, but not for the strength to carry it.

card.name: Jhoira of the Ghitu
card.property: {2}, Exile a nonland card from your hand: Put four time counters on the exiled card. If it doesn't have suspend, it gains suspend. (At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter from that card. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost. If it's a creature, it has haste.)

card.name: Sliver Legion

property.name: Color
property.value: Multicolor White Blue Black Red Green

card.property: All Sliver creatures get +1/+1 for each other Sliver on the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Hidden within the clicking, chittering swarm is a unique mind, still young, but growing more aware as time passes.

card.name: Akroma's Memorial
card.property: Creatures you control have flying, first strike, vigilance, trample, haste, and protection from black and from red.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "No rest. No mercy. No matter what." —Memorial inscription

card.name: Cloud Key
card.property: As Cloud Key enters the battlefield, choose artifact, creature, enchantment, instant, or sorcery. Spells you cast of the chosen type cost {1} less to cast.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The musical sound of its turning triggers the tumblers of revelation.

card.name: Coalition Relic
card.property: {T}: Add one mana of any color. {T}: Put a charge counter on Coalition Relic. At the beginning of your precombat main phase, remove all charge counters from Coalition Relic. Add one mana of any color for each charge counter removed this way.

card.name: Epochrasite
card.property: Epochrasite enters the battlefield with three +1/+1 counters on it if you didn't cast it from your hand. When Epochrasite dies, exile it with three time counters on it and it gains suspend. (At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast this card without paying its mana cost. It has haste.)

card.name: Sliversmith
card.property: {1}, {T}, Discard a card: Create a 1/1 colorless Sliver artifact creature token named Metallic Sliver.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: After centuries of labor, its creations outnumber those they were to mimic.

card.name: Soultether Golem
card.property: Vanishing 1 (This creature enters the battlefield with a time counter on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter from it. When the last is removed, sacrifice it.) Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, put a time counter on Soultether Golem.

card.name: Sword of the Meek
Veilstone Amulet
card.property: Whenever you cast a spell, creatures you control can't be the targets of spells or abilities your opponents control this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Sometimes it's ostentatious to go unseen.

card.name: Darksteel Garrison
card.property: Fortified land has indestructible. Whenever fortified land becomes tapped, target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Fortify {3} ({3}: Attach to target land you control. Fortify only as a sorcery. This card enters the battlefield unattached and stays on the battlefield if the land leaves.)

card.name: Whetwheel
Dakmor Salvage
card.property: Dakmor Salvage enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {B}. Dredge 2 (If you would draw a card, instead you may put exactly two cards from the top of your library into your graveyard. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand. Otherwise, draw a card.)

card.name: Keldon Megaliths
card.property: Keldon Megaliths enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {R}. Hellbent — {1}{R}, {T}: Keldon Megaliths deals 1 damage to any target. Activate this ability only if you have no cards in hand.

card.name: Llanowar Reborn
card.property: Llanowar Reborn enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {G}. Graft 1 (This land enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it. Whenever a creature enters the battlefield, you may move a +1/+1 counter from this land onto it.)

card.name: New Benalia
card.property: New Benalia enters the battlefield tapped. When New Benalia enters the battlefield, scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.) {T}: Add {W}.

card.name: Tolaria West
card.property: Tolaria West enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {U}. Transmute {1}{U}{U} ({1}{U}{U}, Discard this card: Search your library for a card with converted mana cost 0, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library. Transmute only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Dryad Arbor
card.property: (Dryad Arbor isn't a spell, it's affected by summoning sickness, and it has "{T}: Add {G}.")

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Touch no tree, break no branch, and speak only the question you wish answered." —Von Yomm, elder druid, to her initiates

card.name: Graven Cairns
card.property: {T}: Add {C}. {B/R}, {T}: Add {B}{B}, {B}{R}, or {R}{R}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Shamans of Kar-Sengir claim that their sun sets because it can no longer bear the gaze of those pain-carved cliffs.

card.name: Grove of the Burnwillows
card.property: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Add {R} or {G}. Each opponent gains 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Spring is the most beautiful season in the grove, when the new leaves open from their ember-buds in a race of leaping flames.

card.name: Horizon Canopy
card.property: {T}, Pay 1 life: Add {G} or {W}. {1}, {T}, Sacrifice Horizon Canopy: Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The great leaves are resilient underfoot. Heavy steps do not bruise them, but release a sweet and spicy scent.

card.name: Nimbus Maze
card.property: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Add {W}. Activate this ability only if you control an Island. {T}: Add {U}. Activate this ability only if you control a Plains.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: To find its center is to find one's own.

card.name: River of Tears
card.property: {T}: Add {U}. If you played a land this turn, add {B} instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Westfolk wept, and their tears wore winding rivers into the cheek of the world." —Glem the Lonebard, "Origins of Kholon"

card.name: Zoetic Cavern
card.property: {T}: Add {C}. Morph {2} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Nothing lives within it, yet there is life.
